Title: An epic narrative
Content: One of the abiding themes of modern Kannada fiction has been the profoundly tragic vision of a community falling apart owing to the implosions caused by the inevitable historical changes. Modern Kanna
Author: RAJENDRA CHENNI
Description: One of the abiding themes of modern Kannada fiction has been the profoundly tragic vision of a community falling apart owing to the implosions caused by the inevitable historical changes. Modern Kanna
